login.forgotPasswordPlaceholder: Contact your gym admin to reset your password.
login.trainerHint: Use your gym's link and registered email.
login.errors.multipleAccounts: This email is linked to more than one gym. Please use the exact login link your gym gave you.
trainer.viewNutritionWorkout: View Nutrition AI and Workout info for each member assigned to you.
trainer.needsAttentionDesc: You are an AI Trainer Assistant. Analyze today's member activity and identify who needs attention. For each member: identify the main problem, assign risk level (Low / Medium / High), and suggest ONE clear action.
trainer.resultTableTitle: Result: Name | Issue | Risk Level | Suggested Trainer Action
trainer.noMembersAssigned: No members assigned to you yet.
trainer.hintOnboarding: Your admin can assign members from Onboarding → Members enrolled for AI.
trainer.addOneMemberError: Add at least one member with a name.
voice.speakMeal: Speak your meal (e.g. 2 idlis, sambar, coffee)
